name: Drunk Guy!
description:
A game made for the Ludum Dare 37 Game Jam

Drunk Guy is the most accurate drunk walking simulator ever created! Be warned you may get so immersed that you get drunk in real life as well!

Everyone knows the problem when drinking to much, you gotta go to the bathroom which can be a real pain. The goal of the game is reaching this one holy room without slipping from the platforms or getting pushed off by other party dudes.

The controls are simple
WASD - Movement
Shift - Slow run
Space - Jump
R - restart
Esc - Quit


Credits:
Gregg Finden - 3D models
Kirk Markarian - Sound design
